post.description:
This endpoint will create a new user. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 New User Registered Register the User successfully
400 Bad Request If user have incomplete request body.
401 Invalid Credentials Invalid username or password
500 Server Error If internal server error occured

This endpoint will help to login in the system using the Bearer Token. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Token Created Creates the token successfully
400 Bad Request If user have incomplete request body.
401 Invalid Credentials Invalid username or password
500 Server Error If internal server error occured

delete.description:
This endpoint will help the user to logout from the system. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Logged Out Successfully logouts from the system.
401 Unauthorized If token has been revoked.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

get.description:
This endpoint will get all bookings. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Booking Data Return all the bookings.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will create a new booking. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. 3) The dietaryRequirements must be one of **Yes, No**. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Booking Created Returns the created booking
400 Bad Request Returns the validation errors.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking that we want to match

get.description:
This endpoint will get Booking by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Booking Data Returns the booking with given ID.
404 Not Found Booking Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

put.description:
This endpoint will update a booking by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Booking Data Updates the booking with given ID.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Booking Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

delete.description:
This API Endpoint will delete Booking by ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Booking Data Booking Deleted Successfully.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Booking Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

get.description:
This endpoint will get all contacts. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Contact Request Data Return all the contact requests.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will create a new contact request. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Contact Request Created Returns the created contact request.
400 Bad Request Returns the validation errors.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contact that we want to match

get.description:
This endpoint will get contact by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Contact Request Data Returns the contact request with given ID.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Contact Request Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

put.description:
This endpoint will update a contact by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Contact Request Data Updates the contact with given ID.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Contact Request Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

delete.description:
This API Endpoint will delete contact by ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Contact Data Contact Deleted Successfully.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Contact Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

get.description:
This endpoint will get all events. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Request Data Return all the event requests.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will create a new event. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. 3) The status must be one of **book now, sold out, cancelled**. 4) The date must be in the format **YYYY-MM-DD**. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
201 Event Created Returns the event request.
400 Bad Request Returns the validation errors.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the event that we want to match

get.description:
This endpoint will get event by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Data Returns the event with given ID.
404 Not Found Error If ID is wrong or Document Not Found.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: Bearer token to access these api endpoints

put.description:
This endpoint will update Event by given ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. 3) The status must be one of **book now, sold out, cancelled**. 4) The date must be in the format **YYYY-MM-DD**. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Data Updates the event with given ID.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Event Not Found
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

delete.description:
This API Endpoint will delete event by ID. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Data Event Deleted Successfully.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Error Event Not Found or Deleted
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will upload a new image. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. 3) The device_type must be one of **mobile, desktop**. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Image Uploaded Returns the fileurl.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Error EventID Not Found
413 Request Entity Too large If request entity is too large
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

delete.description:
This endpoint will delete an existing image. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. 3) Object_key is the filename from the file_url: https://wild-cabarets.fra1.digitaloceanspaces.com/wild-cabarets/**filename** **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Event Image Deleted Deletes the file successfully.
401 Unauthorized Missing Authorization Header.
404 Not Found Error Event Image Not Found or Deleted.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will subscribe the newsletter. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Newsletter Subscribed Returns the newsletter data.
400 Bad Request Contact Email is required
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

get.description:
This endpoint will return all Subscribers. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Subscribers Data Return all the subscribers.
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

post.description:
This endpoint will unsubscribe the newsletter. __Usage__: 1) Click on the **Try it out** button. 2) Click on the **Execute** button to submit the request. **The below table defines the HTTP Status codes that this API may return**
Status Code Description Reason
200 Newsletter Unsubscribed Returns the unsubscribed newsletter data.
400 Bad Request Contact Email is required
401 Unauthorized If Missing Authorization Header.
500 Server Error If Internal server error occured.

JWT.name: Authorization
JWT.description: JWT authorization token. Include 'Bearer' followed by a space and the token value.

example.msg: Invalid Object ID or Document Not Found

example: status must be one of book now, sold out, cancelled.

example.message: Invalid Object ID or Booking not found
Invalid Object ID or Contact not found
Invalid Object ID or Event not found
Invalid Object ID or File not found
Invalid Object ID or Newsletter not found
